AzureBlade: I take it your circuits are getting back online. That's
good. (He looked at the stream, then up at the waterfall.) As for this
source... I would rather destroy it more than anything. This way, it
could not become an asset in this war. However, you are not as
impartial as I am, if I am right. Nonetheless, I will keep the secret.

He wanted to see for himself, so he entered the water until he was
about waist deep. He felt nothing special...

AzureBlade: By the way, what's your name?

--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, EmprzAnastazia@a... wrote:
> In a message dated 6/10/03 11:59:25 AM Central Daylight Time, 
> Proudwing500k@h... writes:
> 
> 
> > Feeling this was getting too intimate, AzureBlade broke the spark
> > contact and came out of his trance.
> > 
> > AzureBlade: Forgive me. I haven't explained everything. I am known as
> > Protoform Z, but my name is AzureBlade. I can feel things through my
> > spark, things like other sparks. I felt you were wounded, so I came to
> > offer my help. If you do not wish it, I will go. As for him... (He
> > pointed at Scourge) I have never seen him and I do not know him.
> 
> She only stood there, watching Azureblade.
> 
> > 
> > He rose from the ground and walked toward Scourge.
> 
> Her crimson optics followed Azureblade....
> 
> > 
> > AzureBlade: Easy now! Relax and try to focus on your internal repairs.
> > You're wounded too. (Turning to Maxima) Would this happen to be some
> > kind of haven for the injured?
> 
> This started her pondering as well. "Indeed. These waters have an
energy to 
> them to revitalize & repair." She turned to the 2, her old
personality was 
> starting to show through now from teh innocent confusion she had
before. "For 
> this, neither of you should speak of this place. If you cannot keep
it a secret, 
> then you shall remain here or be terminated." Her crimson optics
glared at them 
> both. "Do I make myself clear?" 
> 
> The powers of the waters was showing with her form repairing itself,
double 
> the speed as with the normal repair system. It was like the CR
Chambers but 
> slightly better. 
> 
> Standing there before them, the waterfall behind her, her form
shimmering 
> from the energy water & the sun, her crimson optics glowing at the 2
male bots.
